projects.name: A fast and highly interpretable Python library for manipulating multivariate Gaussian distributions
projects.summary: Manipulations of Gaussian distributions are sometimes too cumbersome and troublesome especially when the distributions are multivariate. In this project, I am developing a Python library that enables calculation of product, quotient, marginal, and conditional distributions of multivariate Gaussian distribution more easily and with higher interpretability.
